topic.title: Best of Blacksburg: Coffee Shops
topic.shortdesc: Hello, and welcome to my guide on the best coffee shops in Blacksburg! As a senior at Virginia Tech, I have frequented many Blacksburg cafes over the years and I have identified what exactly makes a good cafe and what makes a bad one. Everyone needs a good place to get a cup of coffee, whether you’re a student studying for finals, an alumnus visiting, or if you just want some hot cocoa to walk around town with, you need a coffee shop you can rely on. I will consider the relevant cafes in the area and rate them according to criteria including accessibility and location, aesthetic and vibe, quality of coffee and food, and overall experience. A detailed description of each category of criteria can be found below.

image.alt: Picture of a coffee cup and a spoon full of coffee beans.

body.p: Rating Criteria: Each category of criteria will be rated 1 through 5, 1 being the lowest score and 5 being the highest. With all the scores added up, each cafe will receive a rating out of 20.

ul.li: How close is it to campus?
Is it relatively quiet for doing homework or studying?
Is the interior clean and well-decorated?
Is the exterior clean and well-kept?
Does the coffee shop’s vibe work well for hanging out with friends or doing homework?

p.b: Quality of Coffee and Food (1-5 rating)

ul.li: Does the menu provide a wide variety of drinks (i.e. espresso drinks, coffee, tea, matcha, chai, hot chocolate)?
Does the menu provide food options?

body.p: In my professional opinion, an ideal coffee shop provides a two-fold experience to meet the needs of a variety of customers.

ol.li: It can be a convenient grab-and-go experience. This is for busy individuals who are in need of an espresso drink immediately and don’t have time to wait in a long line. The cafe ideally operates to make coffees quickly and efficiently to help their customers get out the door.

It can also be a comfy, stay-a-while cafe. This is for the students who are looking for a place to get a coffee, sit down, and study for a couple hours. Or perhaps for individuals who want to catch up with their friends over a cup of coffee in a warm atmosphere.

body.p: If a coffee shop can meet both of these needs, it is creating the best overall experience for its customers.
